ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night vision video CMOS security camera
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV lines. Camera Lens: 6.0mm. Signal System: NTSC standard
IR Illuminators: 36 infrared LED. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
Package included: 1 x bullet camera, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply , 1 x preamp microphone, 1 x audio video power extension cable and 1 x security warning Decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV Infrared Outdoor Security Camera Day Night Vision Home Video Surveillance with Preamp Microphone, Power Supply and Extension Cable CTD
